scripts.ci: npm ci && lerna exec --ignore=@template/* --stream -- npm ci
scripts.outdated: (npm outdated || true) && lerna exec --stream -- npm outdated
scripts.remove: lerna exec --stream -- rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json *.tgz && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json  *.tgz
scripts.reinstall: npm run remove && npm run update
scripts.update: npm install && lerna exec --ignore=@template/* --stream -- npm install && npm update && lerna exec --ignore=@template/* --stream -- npm update
